item.description:
Harvard Square is popular not only for the university, the street performers, the shopping, and the night life... it also has great food!

Come join me for a great Indian buffet. If you are cautious about Indian food, a buffet is a great way to try out new dishes.

I hope you can join me and friends new and old.

Cheers!
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations are under "Heather" and I will send out my cell number the day before.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Indian Lunch
